00013 Clip::Clip (const std::vector<unsigned char> &image, const unsigned int &imageWidth, const unsigned int &row, const unsigned int &column, const unsigned int &height, const unsigned int &width)
00014     :   row_(row),
00015         column_(column),
00016         width_(width),
00017         height_(height)
00018 {
00019     if ( (height == 0) and (width == 0) )
00020         throw NessieException ("Clip constructor has 0 size");
00021     
00022     if ( width > imageWidth )
00023         throw NessieException ("Clip width cannot be wider than underlying image's width");
00024         
00025     // Number of pixels within the clip
00026     size_ = width * height;
00027     
00028     // Space allocation for the clip
00029     pixels_ = new unsigned char[size_];
00030     
00031     // Copy the data from the underlying image
00032     for ( unsigned int i = row; i < (row + height); ++i )
00033     {
00034         std::vector<unsigned char>::const_iterator rowIterator = image.begin();
00035         advance (rowIterator, (i * imageWidth) + column);
00036         
00037         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < width; ++j )
00038         {
00039             pixels_[i * width + j] = *rowIterator;
00040             advance (rowIterator, 1);
00041         }
00042     }
00043 };
00044 
00045 
00046 
00050 Clip::~Clip ()
00051 {
00052     delete[] pixels_;
00053 }
